definition: to register (to an official organism)/to file a case (for investigation)
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
to file for investigation/to prosecute (a case)

sentences.english: Thirdly, the reception and examination of appeal should be standardized.
sentences.chinese: 再次，应规范立卷受理和立案审查两个阶段。

sentences.english: The large-scale riots have been based on the facts of the criminal case.
sentences.chinese: 当局已经根据大规模骚乱的事实进行了刑事立案。

sentences.english: New York City councilman is proposing a similar law.
sentences.chinese: 纽约市的一个议员也正在提议类似的法律立案。

sentences.english: We have registered an FIR under abduction against the boy.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经对男孩以绑架罪进行立案。

sentences.english: Procuratorates also supervised the public security organs in investigation of 5 IPR infringement crimes.
sentences.chinese: 监督公安机关立案侦查侵犯知识产权犯罪案件5件。

sentences.english: Yesterday morning, the police to investigate cases of violations of property order.
sentences.chinese: 昨天上午，警方以侵犯财物治安案件立案调查。

sentences.english: With evidence and an eyewitness, the man's theft case was open and shut.
sentences.chinese: 由于证据和目击者，这位男子的窃案容易立案。

sentences.english: There is closer relations between filing a case and starting investigation.
sentences.chinese: 立案与提起侦查程序存在着密切的关系。

sentences.english: Criminal case supervision is given an important duty of the prosecution by law.
sentences.chinese: 刑事立案监督是法律赋予检察机关的一项重要职责。

sentences.english: The threat of criminal prosecution can doom a business.
sentences.chinese: 面临刑事立案的企业或将万劫不复。

sentences.english: This case should be put on file for investigation and prosecution.
sentences.chinese: 检察院已经立案侦查此事。

sentences.english: So when we brought the case against the prosecutor it was a complete failure.
sentences.chinese: 结果我们对该名检察官的立案是一次彻头彻尾的失败。

sentences.english: Satisfied afore-mentioned a few conditions, enough put on record of insurance company ability.
sentences.chinese: 满足了上述的几个条件，保险公司才能够立案。

sentences.english: These deficiencies constrain supervision the work on file.
sentences.chinese: 这些缺陷制约了立案监督工作的开展。

sentences.english: Therefore study on criminal case-filing supervision has not yet formed its own system.
sentences.chinese: 可以说，对刑事立案监督的研究还没有形成体系。

sentences.english: Filing case, as the beginning of investigation has double meanings in procedure and entity.
sentences.chinese: 立案是侦查的开始，具有程序和实体上的双重意义。

definition: to transfer (a case, a person, files etc)
to accept to hear a case/to handle (a service)
to file for investigation/to prosecute (a case)
to conclude a case/to wind up
common plea/civil appeal (as opposed to criminal case)
to protest against a verdict/to lodge an appeal
to sue/to bring a lawsuit against/to prosecute
